title: Stéphane Garcia
text:
Stéphane Garcia (born 4 April 1991) is a <a href="Switzerland">Swiss</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a>.
Career.
Garcia began his career with <a href="Etoile-Carouge%20FC">Etoile-Carouge FC</a>, who was promoted to the <a href="Swiss%20Challenge%20League">Swiss Challenge League</a> in summer 2006, after two years joined in July 2008 to <a href="Neuch%C3%A2tel%20Xamax">Neuchâtel Xamax</a>. He played only one game for <a href="Neuch%C3%A2tel%20Xamax">Neuchâtel Xamax</a> and joined on 29 June 2009 on loan to <a href="FC%20Le%20Mont">FC Le Mont</a> before transferring back to Etoile-Carouge FC. He moved on to <a href="FC%20Lugano">FC Lugano</a> in July 2012.
